name: CircleTest
description: Unit tests for the Circle class, focusing on its coordinates, distance, MBR, equality, hash code, and intersection functionalities.

test_cases.name: testCoordinates
test_cases.description: Tests the coordinates (x, y) of the Circle.

test_cases.name: testDistance
test_cases.description: Tests the distance calculation between a Circle and a Rectangle.

test_cases.name: testMbr
test_cases.description: Tests the Minimum Bounding Rectangle (MBR) of the Circle.

test_cases.name: testEquality
test_cases.description: Tests the equality of two Circle objects with the same properties.

test_cases.name: testInequalityRadius
test_cases.description: Tests the inequality of two Circle objects with different radii.

test_cases.name: testInequalityX
test_cases.description: Tests the inequality of two Circle objects with different x coordinates.

test_cases.name: testInequalityY
test_cases.description: Tests the inequality of two Circle objects with different y coordinates.

test_cases.name: testInequalityWithNull
test_cases.description: Tests the inequality of a Circle object with null.

test_cases.name: testHashCode
test_cases.description: Tests the hash code of the Circle.

test_cases.name: testDistanceIsZeroWhenIntersects
test_cases.description: Tests that the distance is zero when a Circle intersects with a Rectangle.

test_cases.name: testIntersects2
test_cases.description: Tests that the distance is non-zero when a Circle does not intersect with a Rectangle.

test_cases.name: testIntersects3
test_cases.description: Tests that the distance is non-zero when a Circle does not intersect with a Rectangle.

test_cases.name: testIntersectsReturnsTrue
test_cases.description: Tests that the intersects method returns true when a Circle intersects with a Rectangle.

test_cases.name: testIntersectsReturnsFalse
test_cases.description: Tests that the intersects method returns false when a Circle does not intersect with a Rectangle.

test_cases.name: testIntersects
test_cases.description: Tests the intersection of two Circle objects.

test_cases.name: testDoNotIntersect
test_cases.description: Tests that two Circle objects do not intersect.

test_cases.name: testIntersectsPoint
test_cases.description: Tests that a Circle intersects with a Point.

test_cases.name: testDoesNotIntersectPoint
test_cases.description: Tests that a Circle does not intersect with a Point.
